goal.ch: 在教導研究生深入了解並學會使用，近30年來在大氣科學研究領域中經常被使用的幾個高等統計與高等應用數學方法。期能增強同學在資料處理與研究方法之能力，進而擴充其專業知識與研究領域。
goal.en: to familiar with principal component and multivariate analyses in meteorology and climatology

outline.ch: 1) Review of basic statistics and Time Series Analysis (單元至多元迴歸分析)  2) Digital filter and smoothing: high pass， low pass， and band pass filter.   Least-square fit， Murakami method，  Lanczos method， and others.  3) FFT (Fast Fourier Transfer Method): ECMWF‘s FFT991 analysis  4) Spectral Transfer Method and Analysis: Double FFT and Spheric harmonic analysis  5) Principal component analysis (PCA): variance， covariance， auto-correlation and lag correlation， …SVD (Singular Value Decomposition)，  EOF(empirical orthogonal fuction) analysis， extended-EOF analysis， SSA (singular spectral analysis)， CCA (canonical correlation analysis)， and heterogeneous correlation maps， etc.  6)  multivariate analyses: introduction to factor analysis， cluster analysis， Discriminant Analysis， and Neural Network Analysis (if time available)
outline.en: 1) Review of basic statistics and Time Series Analysis (單元至多元迴歸分析)  2) Digital filter and smoothing: high pass， low pass， and band pass filter.   Least-square fit， Murakami method，  Lanczos method， and others.  3) FFT (Fast Fourier Transfer Method): ECMWF‘s FFT991 analysis  4) Spectral Transfer Method and Analysis: Double FFT and Spheric harmonic analysis  5) Principal component analysis (PCA): variance， covariance， auto-correlation and lag correlation， …SVD (Singular Value Decomposition)，  EOF(empirical orthogonal fuction) analysis， extended-EOF analysis， SSA (singular spectral analysis)， CCA (canonical correlation analysis)， and heterogeneous correlation maps， etc.  6)  multivariate analyses: introduction to factor analysis， cluster analysis， Discriminant Analysis， and Neural Network Analysis (if time available)

textbook.ch: 1. Digital filters  2. Principal component analysis in meteorology and oceanography.  3. Numerical recipes.  4. papers
textbook.en: 1. Digital filters  2. Principal component analysis in meteorology and oceanography.  3. Numerical recipes.  4. papers

flexDiscription.ch:
氣候統計專題分析與討論
(以高考氣候學試題為例)

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力

en.competencies: ability in independent thinking and researching
Ability in advanced mathematics and science and proffesional knowledge
Ability in computer and programming application
Ability in international horizons and communication
Ability in professional ethics and  community service and learning

ch: 系所:限大氣科學學系。年級:限四年級。
系所:限大氣科學學系大氣物理碩士班。
en: Department:Department of Atmospheric Physics only.Year:Fourth Year only.
